name: CNContainer
desc: An immutable object that represents a collection of contacts.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier for a contacts container on the device.

items.name: enum CNContainerType
items.desc: The container may be local on the device or associated with a server account that has contacts.

items.name: class func predicateForContainerOfContact(withIdentifier: String) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find the container of the specified contact.

items.name: class func predicateForContainers(withIdentifiers: [String]) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find the containers with the specified identifiers.

items.name: class func predicateForContainerOfGroup(withIdentifier: String) -> NSPredicate
items.desc: Returns a predicate to find the container of the specified group.

items.name: let CNContainerIdentifierKey: String
items.desc: The identifier key of the container.
